column1: 29834,Thunderbolts (2006) #141,141,33948,46,"Norman Osborn has unleashed his team of psycho killers and ordered them to the site of the biggest battle they will ever face: Asgard! Standing in their way are the Mighty Avengers. An epic clash begins here with no-holds-barred action. There will be blood!  Rated T  ...$2.99",
